price: آنگاه [آنان] به خود آمدند و [به یکدیگر] گفتند: «واقعاً شما [مشرک و] ستمکارید».
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
